thread.title: Ali Al Balushi records third straight win in Red Bull car park drift qualifier
thread.title_full: Ali Al Balushi records third straight win in Red Bull car park drift qualifier

author: muscatdaily@apexmedia.co.om (Muscat Daily News)
title: Ali Al Balushi records third straight win in Red Bull car park drift qualifier
text:
Ali Al Balushi records third straight win in Red Bull car park drift qualifier Ali al Balushi (centre) celebrates his victory on the podium October 12, 2015 
Ali Al Balushi took the first place for the third year in a row in the Red Bull car park drift qualifier that was held at the Oman Automobile Association's (OAA) tracks recently. 
The Omani driver scored 381 points and as a result of the qualifying-leg victory, he will represent the country in the regional finals that will be hosted in Dubai, UAE on November 20. The second place went to Refaat al Yahyaei (370 points) and the third place was taken by Abdullah al Balushi (316). 
A total of 16 Omani drifters competed in the sixth season of the Red Bull Car Park Drift qualifier. 
Ali in action during the qualifier at the OAA tracks 
Ali said after the win, “I am glad to have won this qualifier for the third year in a row. At the regional finals, I will compete in a powerful modified car. I couldn't win the finals last year. This year, I will try to finish as the champion.” 
Qualifying rounds took off at the start of the year in UAE, Tunisia, Kuwait, Lebanon, Mauritius and Jordan. There are several fixtures lined up to display some of the top drift performances in the region in Egypt and Qatar in anticipation of the finals in Dubai next month. Similar content
